answers.answer: Ya, this site is having some problems too.I don't know if you have these site.  You will have to do a little home work here because I can't pick your doctor ;)NEW YORK: THYROID TOP DOCTORS DIRECTORYhttp://www.thyroid-info.com/topdrs/newyork.htmRochester NY, pick your preferences: Diabetes, Endocrinology & Metabolismhttp://www.healthgrades.com/consumer/index.cfm?fuseaction=mod&modtype=PRC&modact=refineThen after you have chosen a doctor you can check him/her out at below sites:Grades the performance of hospitals, physicians, health plans, nursing homes and other health care providers in the United Stateshttp://www.healthgrades.com/default.cfmCheck credentials of Physicians and HealthCare Practitionershttp://www.medicine.org/?q=node/125029How to check credentials of Physicians and HealthCare PractitionersA FREE health professional licensing database provided by the Association of State Medical Board Executive Directors and Administrators in Medicine.http://www.docboard.org/docfinder.htmlAmerican Medical Association Doctor FinderProvides FREE information on member physicians in the United States.DoctorFinder provides you with basic professional information on virtually every licensed physician in the United States. This includes more than 690,000 doctorshttp://webapps.ama-assn.org/doctorfinder/home.htmlGood Luck!GL,1990 Hyper/Graves'1997 Dia/RAI1999 Slight TED, Visible Nodule
